channel.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
channel.description:
I was just wondering because I'm always having a problem choosing colors for websites I make. I figure if I ask this question I'll have a lot more to get ahead of in :).
How many colors does a website usually have on it?
From what I see, color scheme - which people tell me to use all the time (but I don't cooperate with it well), people are able to have done so much with them. I don't believe them though because people are [b]ALWAYS[/b] looking for awesome colorful sites.
So far this is the only site I have checked out:
http://www.waztech.com/library/samples.asp
I will check out more when I get home from school though.

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

I would use three for main colors.
Color 1: Background
Color 2: body(not sure if that’s the word i’m looking for)
Color 3: text.

Spin the wheel here and it’ll give you three colors to use:
http://www.colorsontheweb.com/colorwheel.asp#wheel

Read full topic
item.source: How many colors do a website usually have?

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:279578”]Whatever you do, don’t make a website look anything like this:

http://web.archive.org/web/20060613061524/http://moire.ch/

(move your mouse over the links)[/quote]

i almost had a fit xDD

Read full topic

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Try using the palette search on http://colourlovers.com
Just enter a keyword for your site, and there you have it, a shitload of palettes with fitting colors for a website

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Blue/Gray/White are commonly used to calm the user and put them in a good mood.

Read full topic
item.source: How many colors do a website usually have?

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Use 2 or 3. (White(or lightgrey) + 1 or 2 of your choose).

Look at great sites to see how it is done and remember the most important, your CONTENT.

Read full topic
item.source: How many colors do a website usually have?

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“PeeHPee, post:5, topic:279578”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=368950.msg2793729#msg2793729 date=1242937155]
2: black and white. Done.
[/quote]
black isn’t a color.[/quote]
to be fair you are right, but neither is white they are technically shades hence why they arent included in primary colour wheels. So then the right answer to the original question is 0 just have black and white

Read full topic
item.source: How many colors do a website usually have?

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Halogenisation, post:1, topic:279713”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=368950.msg2794314#msg2794314 date=1242966794]

2: black and white. Done.

black isn’t a color.
[/quote]What a useless comment…

http://www.admixweb.com/2009/04/24/seven-tips-to-use-colors-in-your-site/
http://www.colorschemer.com/online.html

colour isn’t the ratio of different colours in it, it’s how your brain responds to the reflection or absorbtion of a medium. If you’re saying black isn’t a colour that’s like saying white is more of a colour than red.[/quote]Why are you quoting me? Quote the guy that is against your argument.

Read full topic

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I’m going to imagine he wanted to know how many colors does a good website have.

Well, first of all, your best bet is to use a maximum of a about 3 colors. They have to match with eachother: using more then 3 will more then likely distract the user.

Read full topic
item.source: How many colors do a website usually have?

item.title: How many colors do a website usually have?
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

most websites only use one or two colors, e.g., moparisthebest default theme only uses blue and white.

Read full topic
